dietPlan.overview: You are severely underweight. You should aim to increase your calorie intake and eat a balanced diet with plenty of protein, healthy fats, and whole grains.

foodSuggestions.notes: Nuts are a good source of healthy fats and protein.
Seeds are a good source of healthy fats, protein, and fiber.
Avocado is a good source of healthy fats and fiber.
Quinoa is a good source of protein and fiber.
Lean meats are a good source of protein.

foodAvoidance.notes: Avoid processed foods that are high in unhealthy fats, added sugars, and refined carbohydrates.
Avoid fast food that is high in unhealthy fats, added sugars, and sodium.
Avoid sugary drinks that are high in added sugars and calories.

dietPlan.overview: You are underweight. You should aim to increase your calorie intake and eat a balanced diet with plenty of protein, healthy fats, and whole grains.

foodSuggestions.notes: Nuts are a good source of healthy fats and protein.
Seeds are a good source of healthy fats, protein, and fiber.
Avocado is a good source of healthy fats and fiber.
Quinoa is a good source of protein and fiber.
Lean meats are a good source of protein.

foodAvoidance.notes: Avoid fast food that is high in unhealthy fats, added sugars, and sodium.
Avoid sugary drinks that are high in added sugars and calories.

dietPlan.overview: You are in a healthy weight range. You should aim to maintain a balanced diet with plenty of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats.

foodSuggestions.notes: Fruits are a good source of vitamins, minerals, and fiber.
Vegetables are a good source of vitamins, minerals, and fiber.
Whole grains are a good source of fiber, vitamins, and minerals.
Lean proteins are a good source of protein and nutrients.
Healthy fats are important for brain health and can be found in foods like olive oil, nuts, and avocado.

foodAvoidance.notes: Limit processed foods that are high in unhealthy fats, added sugars, and sodium.
Limit fast food that is high in unhealthy fats, added sugars, and sodium.
Limit sugary drinks that are high in added sugars and calories.

dietPlan.overview: You are overweight. You should aim to reduce your calorie intake and eat a balanced diet with plenty of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats.

foodSuggestions.notes: Fruits are a good source of vitamins, minerals, and fiber.
Vegetables are a good source of vitamins, minerals, and fiber.
Whole grains are a good source of fiber, vitamins, and minerals.
Lean proteins are a good source of protein and nutrients.
Healthy fats are important for brain health and can be found in foods like olive oil, nuts, and avocado.

foodAvoidance.notes: Avoid processed foods that are high in unhealthy fats, added sugars, and sodium.
Avoid fast food that is high in unhealthy fats, added sugars, and sodium.
Avoid sugary drinks that are high in added sugars and calories.
Limit your intake of red meat.
Avoid highly processed foods like chips, crackers, and cookies.
